name: Inverse Defense
description:
You are a voodoo puppet that wants to be used for good. 

Defeat as many as bad puppets you can.

Controls:

-Move with A and D

-Shoot with K

-Change of ground tih spacebar

We made this game during Malaga Game Jam Weekend 8 (2018), with the conditoned theme "Inversion". That's why we chose to use it changing the groundwhere you play.

Teacup team (and our twitters):
